articles.description: Former England manager Sven-Goran Eriksson dies at the age of 76.

articles.description: Reaction to the weekend's football, as Liverpool make it two wins in two under new manager Arne Slot and Chelsea hammer Wolves in Enzo Maresca's first win.
articles.title: Latest: Liverpool win again under Slot & Maresca gets first Chelsea victory

articles.description: Sven-Goran Eriksson was engaging, courteous and a shrewd tactician - and he could, and should, have ended England's trophy drought.
articles.title: Sven-Goran Eriksson obituary: Ex-England manager who could and should have ended trophy drought

articles.title: Solheim Cup: Georgia Hall handed European wildcard spot to face United States in Virginia

articles.description: Everton striker Neal Maupay responds to a group of supporters who verbally abused Toffees players at London Euston station.
articles.title: Everton: Maupay responds to fans who verbally abused players

articles.description: The chance of another “normal” Paralympics with fans, plus having her children watching again, was a major factor in Sarah Storey returning for a remarkable ninth Games.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: Sarah Storey wants her children to remember her ninth Games

articles.description: Travis Clayton is set to begin his first season with the Buffalo Bills - and here is how he went from an office job to a multi-million dollar NFL contract.
articles.title: NFL: Travis Clayton on going from office job to Buffalo Bills

articles.description: Transfer spending by Premier League teams is £800m down on last summer as the window enters its final week - but why are clubs splashing out less?
